question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct about National Green Tribunal (NGT)?
  1. Appeals from NGT can only go to the Supreme Court and not to high courts
  2. Chairperson of the NGT can only be removed from office in like manner and on the like grounds as a Judge of the Supreme Court
 Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: First statement is correct because as per the NGT Act, appeals from NGT can only go to the Supreme Court, thus by-passing the high courts. Second statement is incorrect because NGT Chairperson can be removed from office by an order of Central Government after an inquiry made by Judge of Supreme Court.
